export const getChildren = (children, typeName) => {
  if (isNull(children)) return null
  return React.Children.map(children, child => child.type.displayName === typeName ? child : null)
}

/* Get the props of the first child object */
export const getChildProps = children => {
  if (isNull(children)) return null
  if (Array.isArray(children) && React.Children.count(children) >= 1) {
    return children[0]?.props
  }
  else {
    return children.props
  }
}

/* Render children, optionally injecting props and ref */
export const renderChildren = (children, props, ref) => {
  if (isNull(children)) return null

  /* Component, i.e. <Data.Pending component={}> */
  const component = getChildProps(children)?.component
  if (component) return createElement(component, { ...props, ref })

  /* Elements */
  return children
}

/* Selector to return the Redux state for a given resource name */
/* Contains an optional select parameter to change the selected root from the default */
export const sliceJson = (name, select) => store => {
  const slice = store?._fetch?.[name]
  if (!isEmpty(slice) && slice.fulfilled)
    return typeof select === 'function'
      ? select(slice.json)
      : slice.json
  else return {}
}

/* A general-purpose selector where the second argument is a function that selects from data in the first argument */
export const selected = (data, select) => {
  return typeof select === 'function' ? select(data) : data
}

/* A selector specifically for map marker data - DEPRECATED */
export const selectMarkerData = (json, select) => {
  if (typeof select?.marker === 'function') {
    return select.marker(json)
  }
  return json
}

/* A selector specifically for map coords data - DEPRECATED */
export const selectCoordsData = (json, select) => {
  if (typeof select?.coords === 'function') {
    return select.coords(json)
  }
  return json
}

/* This will unfreeze Redux data for use in components that mutate data */
export const unfreezeObject = object => {
  if (Array.isArray(object)) {
    return object.map(x => ({ ...x }))
  }
  if (typeof object === 'object') {
    return Object.assign({}, object)
  }
  return object
}

/* Helper function to get a URL parameter */
export const urlParam = name => {
  const queryString = window.location.search
  const urlParams = new URLSearchParams(queryString)
  return urlParams.get(name) ?? ''
}

/* Helper component to render children while optionally passing props and a ref */
export const Children = forwardRef((p, r) => renderChildren(p.childrenToRender, p, r))

/* Custom hook for timeout logic */
export const useTimeout = (secondsToWait, isResolved) => {
  const [secondsElapsed, setSecondsElapsed] = useState(0)
  const [isTimeout, setIsTimeout] = useState(false)

  useEffect(() => {
    if (isResolved === true) {
      setIsTimeout(false)
      setSecondsElapsed(0) /* Reset */
    }
    else if (secondsElapsed >= secondsToWait) setIsTimeout(true)
    else if (secondsElapsed < secondsToWait) {
      const timer = setTimeout(() => setSecondsElapsed(secondsElapsed + 1), 1000)
      return () => clearTimeout(timer)
    }
  }, [secondsToWait, secondsElapsed, isResolved])

  return isTimeout
}

ui/src/components/DataMap/DataMap.js

import React, { useRef, useEffect, useMemo } from 'react'
import PropTypes from 'prop-types'
import { useSelector } from 'react-redux'
import MediaQuery from 'react-responsive'
import { getCenterCoords } from './MapUtils'
import { renderToStaticMarkup } from 'react-dom/server'
import { AttributionControl, Map, ZoomControl, Marker } from 'react-leaflet'
import MarkerClusterGroup from 'react-leaflet-markercluster'
import { latLngBounds } from 'leaflet'
import * as config from '../../config/config.json'
import {
  searchedForMarker,
  relatedParcelMarker,
  directlyEvictedMarker,
} from './Map/map_icons/mapIcons'
import MapBoxGLLayer from './Overlays/MapboxGLLayer'
import mapStyle from './MapStyle'
import { useTranslation } from 'react-i18next'
import i18n from '../../i18n'
import { selectCoordsData, selectMarkerData, isNull, isEmpty, sliceJson } from '../Data/Data'
export { sliceJson, isNull, isEmpty, selectMarkerData, selectCoordsData } from '../Data/DataUtils'

/* 
  DataMap: an optionally data-enabled version of the Leaflet map
  props:
    markers{}: an object specifying column configuration (optional)
    fetch[]: an object specifying data that needs to be fetched (optional)
    note: either the markers or the fetch prop must be provided
*/

const DataMap = props => {
  /* refs usually aren't best react practice usually but I don't know if there's another way to use fitBounds below */
  const mapRef = useRef(null)

  const firstFetchItem = props.fetch?.[0] ?? { slice: null, url: null, select: null }
  const { slice, url } = firstFetchItem
  const json = useSelector(sliceJson(slice))
  const overlays = props.overlays ?? []
  const onSelect = props.onSelect
  const renderMarkerHover = props.renderMarkerHover
  const { t, ready: translationReady } = useTranslation(
    'Map' /* i18next-parser needs string here */,
    { useSuspense: false, i18n }
  )

  const markers = props.markers ?? []
  const isDebugEnabled = props.isDebugEnabled ?? false

  /* Establish a set of variables to pass down to the StyledTable */
  let passDownMarkers = useMemo(() => [], []) /* Don't change every render */
  let passDownCoords = useMemo(() => [], []) /* Don't change every render */

  /* Previously, this map component had two options for how it could be run: */
  /* Option 1: this component accepts marker props and passes them to map components */
  /* Option 2: this component accepts a fetch prop and passes fetch to Data (data is fetched and processed) */
  /* At time of writing (7/7/21) the map only accepts marker props from the parent component, which is either Owner or Parcel */
  if (!isEmpty(markers)) {
    if (isDebugEnabled)
      console.info('%c DataMap: populating the map with marker props', 'color: green')

    /* Eviction API data has info the map needs under a location property */
    passDownMarkers = markers.map(marker => ({ ...marker, ...marker.location }))
    passDownCoords = Object.values(getCenterCoords(passDownMarkers))
  } else {
    /* NOTE that this code may need some upkeep if it is ever used */
    /* It was basically ABANDONED after the decision to go with DataPage */

    /* Eviction API data has info the map needs under a location property */
    passDownMarkers = markers.map(marker => ({ ...marker, ...marker.location }))

    const isPreFetch = isEmpty(json)
    /* TODO: find a way to render the map before fetched data comes in, or reserve space at least */
    if (isPreFetch) {
      if (isDebugEnabled)
        console.info(`DataMap: fetching slice '${slice}' from '${url}'`, 'color: green')
    } else {
      if (isDebugEnabled)
        console.info('%c DataMap: populating the map with fetched data', 'color: green')

      /* calculate the center coordinates of the map boundary */
      const coordsDataJson = selectCoordsData(json)
      if (coordsDataJson) {
        passDownCoords = Object.values(getCenterCoords(coordsDataJson))
      }

      const markerDataJson = selectMarkerData(json)
      passDownMarkers = markerDataJson
    }
  }

  /* this calculates the zoom depending on the markers given. */
  /* It chooses zoom: 14 or the zoom extent covering all markers, whichever is smaller (more can be seen). */
  useEffect(() => {
    if (mapRef.current) {
      const map = mapRef.current.leafletElement
      const bounds = latLngBounds()
      passDownMarkers.forEach(marker => bounds.extend([marker.lat, marker.long]))
      if (map.getBoundsZoom(bounds) < 14) map.fitBounds(bounds)
    }
  }, [mapRef, passDownMarkers])

  if (isNull(props)) return null

  const mapProps = {
    center: passDownCoords,
    zoom: 14,
    maxZoom: 18,
    minZoom: 10,
    touch: false,
    touchZoom: false,
    scrollWheelZoom: false,
    tap: true,
    dragging: true,
    preferCanvas: true,
    zoomControl: false,
    attributionControl: false,
  }

  const largeMapProps = mapProps
  const smallMapProps = { ...mapProps, onContextMenu: e => e.originalEvent.preventDefault() }

  /*
    Determine the appropriate icon for the type of record being displayed:
      It could be an eviction with evict_date and evict_id fields:
        <directlyEvictedMarker/>
      It could be a property that would have an addr and block_lot properties
        It could be the searched for or a related property
          <searchedForMarker/>, <relatedParcelMarker/>
  */
  const getIcon = record => {
    if (typeof record.evict_date === 'string' && typeof record.evict_id === 'string') {
      return directlyEvictedMarker
    } else if (typeof record.addr === 'string' && typeof record.block_lot === 'string') {
      return record.evict_location_accuracy === 'Likely' || record.type === 'Parcel'
        ? searchedForMarker
        : relatedParcelMarker
    }
  }

  if (!translationReady) return null

  if (!isEmpty(passDownCoords)) {
    /* Maps don't currently tolerate empty coords */
    //Note that the media state need to be added to the store to force rerender
    /* TODO: data-enable this component, just the markers part so the map can load on its own */
    return (
      <div style={{ contain: 'content' }} tag='prevent map content from rendering outside the map'>
        <div
          style={{ position: 'relative' }}
          tag='this gives absolutely positioned child elements (map overlays) a reference point'>
          {/* <Data fetch={passDownFetch} isDebugEnabled={isDebugEnabled} /> */}
          <MediaQuery query='(max-width: 800px)'>
            <Map {...smallMapProps} style={{ height: '400px', width: '100%' }} ref={mapRef}>
              <MarkerClusterGroup
                removeOutsideVisibleBounds
                chunkedLoading={true}
                maxClusterRadius={20}
                onMouseOver={e => {
                  e?.layer?._childCount &&
                    e.propagatedFrom
                      .bindTooltip(`${e.layer._childCount} ${t('Evictions')}`)
                      .openTooltip()
                }}
                onMouseOut={e => e.propagatedFrom.unbindTooltip()}>
                {Array.isArray(passDownMarkers) &&
                  passDownMarkers.map((record, index) => {
                    const toolTip = renderToStaticMarkup(renderMarkerHover(record))
                    return (
                      <Marker
                        key={`${record.lat}-${record.long}-${index}`}
                        keyboard={false}
                        position={[record.lat, record.long]}
                        icon={getIcon(record)}
                        onMouseOver={e => e.target.bindTooltip(toolTip).openTooltip()}
                        onMouseOut={e => e.target.unbindTooltip()}
                        onClick={() => onSelect(record)}></Marker>
                    )
                  })}
              </MarkerClusterGroup>
              <MapBoxGLLayer accessToken={config.map.MAPBOX_TOKEN} style={mapStyle} />
              <AttributionControl prefix={config.map.attribution} />
              {Array.isArray(overlays) &&
                overlays.map((overlay, i) => <div key={`overlay-${i}`}>{overlay}</div>)}
              <ZoomControl position='topright' />
            </Map>
          </MediaQuery>
          <MediaQuery query='(min-width: 801px)'>
            <Map {...largeMapProps} style={{ height: '400px', width: '100%' }} ref={mapRef}>
              <MarkerClusterGroup
                removeOutsideVisibleBounds
                chunkedLoading={true}
                maxClusterRadius={20}
                onMouseOver={e => {
                  e?.layer?._childCount &&
                    e.propagatedFrom
                      .bindTooltip(`${e.layer._childCount} ${t('Evictions')}`)
                      .openTooltip()
                }}
                onMouseOut={e => e.propagatedFrom.unbindTooltip()}>
                {Array.isArray(passDownMarkers) &&
                  passDownMarkers.map((record, index) => {
                    const toolTip = renderToStaticMarkup(renderMarkerHover(record))
                    return (
                      <Marker
                        key={`${record.lat}-${record.long}-${index}`}
                        keyboard={false}
                        position={[record.lat, record.long]}
                        icon={getIcon(record)}
                        onMouseOver={e => e.target.bindTooltip(toolTip).openTooltip()}
                        onMouseOut={e => e.target.unbindTooltip()}
                        onClick={() => onSelect(record)}></Marker>
                    )
                  })}
              </MarkerClusterGroup>
              <MapBoxGLLayer accessToken={config.map.MAPBOX_TOKEN} style={mapStyle} />
              <AttributionControl prefix={config.map.attribution} />
              {Array.isArray(overlays) &&
                overlays.map((overlay, i) => <div key={`overlay-${i}`}>{overlay}</div>)}
              <ZoomControl position='topright' />
            </Map>
          </MediaQuery>
          {/*TODO: DATA ENABLE THIS COMPONENT */}
          {/* {
            <DataBox {...props} ns={ns} title={renderParcelLink(evictMapSelection.block_lot, evictMapSelection.addr)} width="235px"> 
          } */}
        </div>
      </div>
    )
  } else return null
}

DataMap.propTypes = {
  fetch: PropTypes.arrayOf(
    PropTypes.shape({
      slice: PropTypes.string.isRequired,
      url: PropTypes.string.isRequired,
      select: PropTypes.func,
    })
  ),
  markers: PropTypes.arrayOf(PropTypes.object),
  isDebugEnabled: PropTypes.bool,
  renderMarkerHover: PropTypes.func,
  overlays: PropTypes.array,
}

export default DataMap

ui/src/components/DataMap/Map/map_icons/mapIcons.js

import L from 'leaflet'
import multipleResultsSVG from './multiple-results-icon.svg'
import searchedForSVG from './searched-for-icon.svg'
import relatedParcelSVG from './related-parcel-icon.svg'
import directlyEvictedSVG from './directly-evicted-icon.svg'
import lightGreenMarker from './light-green-circle-marker-owner-22.png'
import darkGreenMarker from './dark-green-circle-marker-owner-22.png'
import lightOrangeMarker from './light-orange-circle-marker-owner-22.png'
import darkOrangeMarker from './dark-orange-circle-marker-owner-22.png'

const iconAnchor = [ 11, 10 ]

//icons for parcel and neighborhood views
export const multipleResultsMarker = L.icon({
  iconUrl: multipleResultsSVG,
  iconAnchor
})

export const searchedForMarker = L.icon({
  iconUrl: searchedForSVG,
  iconAnchor
})

export const relatedParcelMarker = L.icon({
  iconUrl: relatedParcelSVG,
  iconAnchor
})

export const directlyEvictedMarker = L.icon({
  iconUrl: directlyEvictedSVG,
  iconAnchor
})

export const createClusterMarker = function (cluster, className = 'default-map-cluster') {
  return L.icon({
    iconUrl: multipleResultsSVG,
    iconAnchor
  })
}

//icons for owner view
export const lightGreenLMarker = L.icon({
  iconUrl: lightGreenMarker,
  iconAnchor
})

export const darkGreenLMarker = L.icon({
  iconUrl: darkGreenMarker,
  iconAnchor
})

export const lightOrangeLMarker = L.icon({
  iconUrl: lightOrangeMarker,
  iconAnchor
})

export const darkOrangeLMarker = L.icon({
  iconUrl: darkOrangeMarker,
  iconAnchor
})

ui/src/components/DataMap/MapStyle.js

const mapStyle = {
  version: 8,
  name: 'Basic',
  metadata: {
    'mapbox:autocomposite': true
  },
  sources: {
    mapbox: {
      url: 'mapbox://mapbox.mapbox-streets-v7',
      type: 'vector'
    }
  },
  sprite: 'mapbox://sprites/mapbox/basic-v8',
  glyphs: 'mapbox://fonts/mapbox/{fontstack}/{range}.pbf',
  layers: [
    {
      id: 'background',
      type: 'background',
      paint: {
        'background-color': '#dedede'
      },
      interactive: true
    },
    {
      id: 'landuse_overlay_national_park',
      type: 'fill',
      source: 'mapbox',
      'source-layer': 'landuse_overlay',
      filter: [ '==', 'class', 'national_park' ],
      paint: {
        'fill-color': '#d2edae',
        'fill-opacity': 0.75
      },
      interactive: true
    },
    {
      id: 'landuse_park',
      type: 'fill',
      source: 'mapbox',
      'source-layer': 'landuse',
      filter: [ '==', 'class', 'park' ],
      paint: {
        'fill-color': '#d2edae'
      },
      interactive: true
    },
    {
      id: 'waterway',
      type: 'line',
      source: 'mapbox',
      'source-layer': 'waterway',
      filter: [
        'all',
        [ '==', '$type', 'LineString' ],
        [ 'in', 'class', 'river', 'canal' ]
      ],
      paint: {
        'line-color': '#3d5467',
        'line-width': {
          base: 1.4,
          stops: [ [ 8, 0.5 ], [ 20, 15 ] ]
        }
      },
      interactive: true
    },
    {
      id: 'water',
      type: 'fill',
      source: 'mapbox',
      'source-layer': 'water',
      paint: {
        'fill-color': '#3d5467'
      },
      interactive: true
    },
    {
      id: 'building',
      type: 'fill',
      source: 'mapbox',
      'source-layer': 'building',
      paint: {
        'fill-color': '#d6d6d6'
      },
      interactive: true
    },
    {
      interactive: true,
      layout: {
        'line-cap': 'butt',
        'line-join': 'miter'
      },
      filter: [
        'all',
        [ '==', '$type', 'LineString' ],
        [
          'all',
          [
            'in',
            'class',
            'motorway_link',
            'street',
            'street_limited',
            'service',
            'track',
            'pedestrian',
            'path',
            'link'
          ],
          [ '==', 'structure', 'tunnel' ]
        ]
      ],
      type: 'line',
      source: 'mapbox',
      id: 'tunnel_minor',
      paint: {
        'line-color': '#efefef',
        'line-width': {
          base: 1.55,
          stops: [ [ 4, 0.25 ], [ 20, 30 ] ]
        },
        'line-dasharray': [ 0.36, 0.18 ]
      },
      'source-layer': 'road'
    },
    {
      interactive: true,
      layout: {
        'line-cap': 'butt',
        'line-join': 'miter'
      },
      filter: [
        'all',
        [ '==', '$type', 'LineString' ],
        [
          'all',
          [
            'in',
            'class',
            'motorway',
            'primary',
            'secondary',
            'tertiary',
            'trunk'
          ],
          [ '==', 'structure', 'tunnel' ]
        ]
      ],
      type: 'line',
      source: 'mapbox',
      id: 'tunnel_major',
      paint: {
        'line-color': '#fff',
        'line-width': {
          base: 1.4,
          stops: [ [ 6, 0.5 ], [ 20, 30 ] ]
        },
        'line-dasharray': [ 0.28, 0.14 ]
      },
      'source-layer': 'road'
    },
    {
      interactive: true,
      layout: {
        'line-cap': 'round',
        'line-join': 'round'
      },
      filter: [
        'all',
        [ '==', '$type', 'LineString' ],
        [
          'all',
          [
            'in',
            'class',
            'motorway_link',
            'street',
            'street_limited',
            'service',
            'track',
            'pedestrian',
            'path',
            'link'
          ],
          [ 'in', 'structure', 'none', 'ford' ]
        ]
      ],
      type: 'line',
      source: 'mapbox',
      id: 'road_minor',
      paint: {
        'line-color': '#efefef',
        'line-width': {
          base: 1.55,
          stops: [ [ 4, 0.25 ], [ 20, 30 ] ]
        }
      },
      'source-layer': 'road'
    },
    {
      interactive: true,
      layout: {
        'line-cap': 'round',
        'line-join': 'round'
      },
      filter: [
        'all',
        [ '==', '$type', 'LineString' ],
        [
          'all',
          [
            'in',
            'class',
            'motorway',
            'primary',
            'secondary',
            'tertiary',
            'trunk'
          ],
          [ 'in', 'structure', 'none', 'ford' ]
        ]
      ],
      type: 'line',
      source: 'mapbox',
      id: 'road_major',
      paint: {
        'line-color': '#fff',
        'line-width': {
          base: 1.4,
          stops: [ [ 6, 0.5 ], [ 20, 30 ] ]
        }
      },
      'source-layer': 'road'
    },
    {
      interactive: true,
      layout: {
        'line-cap': 'butt',
        'line-join': 'miter'
      },
      filter: [
        'all',
        [ '==', '$type', 'LineString' ],
        [
          'all',
          [
            'in',
            'class',
            'motorway_link',
            'street',
            'street_limited',
            'service',
            'track',
            'pedestrian',
            'path',
            'link'
          ],
          [ '==', 'structure', 'bridge' ]
        ]
      ],
      type: 'line',
      source: 'mapbox',
      id: 'bridge_minor case',
      paint: {
        'line-color': '#dedede',
        'line-width': {
          base: 1.6,
          stops: [ [ 12, 0.5 ], [ 20, 10 ] ]
        },
        'line-gap-width': {
          base: 1.55,
          stops: [ [ 4, 0.25 ], [ 20, 30 ] ]
        }
      },
      'source-layer': 'road'
    },
    {
      interactive: true,
      layout: {
        'line-cap': 'butt',
        'line-join': 'miter'
      },
      filter: [
        'all',
        [ '==', '$type', 'LineString' ],
        [
          'all',
          [
            'in',
            'class',
            'motorway',
            'primary',
            'secondary',
            'tertiary',
            'trunk'
          ],
          [ '==', 'structure', 'bridge' ]
        ]
      ],
      type: 'line',
      source: 'mapbox',
      id: 'bridge_major case',
      paint: {
        'line-color': '#dedede',
        'line-width': {
          base: 1.6,
          stops: [ [ 12, 0.5 ], [ 20, 10 ] ]
        },
        'line-gap-width': {
          base: 1.55,
          stops: [ [ 4, 0.25 ], [ 20, 30 ] ]
        }
      },
      'source-layer': 'road'
    },
    {
      interactive: true,
      layout: {
        'line-cap': 'round',
        'line-join': 'round'
      },
      filter: [
        'all',
        [ '==', '$type', 'LineString' ],
        [
          'all',
          [
            'in',
            'class',
            'motorway_link',
            'street',
            'street_limited',
            'service',
            'track',
            'pedestrian',
            'path',
            'link'
          ],
          [ '==', 'structure', 'bridge' ]
        ]
      ],
      type: 'line',
      source: 'mapbox',
      id: 'bridge_minor',
      paint: {
        'line-color': '#efefef',
        'line-width': {
          base: 1.55,
          stops: [ [ 4, 0.25 ], [ 20, 30 ] ]
        }
      },
      'source-layer': 'road'
    },
    {
      interactive: true,
      layout: {
        'line-cap': 'round',
        'line-join': 'round'
      },
      filter: [
        'all',
        [ '==', '$type', 'LineString' ],
        [
          'all',
          [
            'in',
            'class',
            'motorway',
            'primary',
            'secondary',
            'tertiary',
            'trunk'
          ],
          [ '==', 'structure', 'bridge' ]
        ]
      ],
      type: 'line',
      source: 'mapbox',
      id: 'bridge_major',
      paint: {
        'line-color': '#fff',
        'line-width': {
          base: 1.4,
          stops: [ [ 6, 0.5 ], [ 20, 30 ] ]
        }
      },
      'source-layer': 'road'
    },
    {
      interactive: true,
      layout: {
        'line-cap': 'round',
        'line-join': 'round'
      },
      filter: [
        'all',
        [ '==', '$type', 'LineString' ],
        [ 'all', [ '<=', 'admin_level', 2 ], [ '==', 'maritime', 0 ] ]
      ],
      type: 'line',
      source: 'mapbox',
      id: 'admin_country',
      paint: {
        'line-color': '#8b8a8a',
        'line-width': {
          base: 1.3,
          stops: [ [ 3, 0.5 ], [ 22, 15 ] ]
        }
      },
      'source-layer': 'admin'
    },
    {
      interactive: true,
      minzoom: 5,
      layout: {
        'icon-image': '{maki}-11',
        'text-offset': [ 0, 0.5 ],
        'text-field': '{name_en}',
        'text-font': [ 'Open Sans Semibold', 'Arial Unicode MS Bold' ],
        'text-max-width': 8,
        'text-anchor': 'top',
        'text-size': 11,
        'icon-size': 1
      },
      filter: [
        'all',
        [ '==', '$type', 'Point' ],
        [ 'all', [ '==', 'scalerank', 1 ], [ '==', 'localrank', 1 ] ]
      ],
      type: 'symbol',
      source: 'mapbox',
      id: 'poi_label',
      paint: {
        'text-color': '#666',
        'text-halo-width': 1,
        'text-halo-color': 'rgba(255,255,255,0.75)',
        'text-halo-blur': 1
      },
      'source-layer': 'poi_label'
    },
    {
      interactive: true,
      layout: {
        'symbol-placement': 'line',
        'text-field': '{name_en}',
        'text-font': [ 'Open Sans Semibold', 'Arial Unicode MS Bold' ],
        'text-transform': 'uppercase',
        'text-letter-spacing': 0.1,
        'text-size': {
          base: 1.4,
          stops: [ [ 10, 8 ], [ 20, 14 ] ]
        }
      },
      filter: [
        'all',
        [ '==', '$type', 'LineString' ],
        [ 'in', 'class', 'motorway', 'primary', 'secondary', 'tertiary', 'trunk' ]
      ],
      type: 'symbol',
      source: 'mapbox',
      id: 'road_major_label',
      paint: {
        'text-color': '#666',
        'text-halo-color': 'rgba(255,255,255,0.75)',
        'text-halo-width': 2
      },
      'source-layer': 'road_label'
    },
    {
      interactive: true,
      minzoom: 8,
      layout: {
        'text-field': '{name_en}',
        'text-font': [ 'Open Sans Semibold', 'Arial Unicode MS Bold' ],
        'text-max-width': 6,
        'text-size': {
          stops: [ [ 6, 12 ], [ 12, 16 ] ]
        }
      },
      filter: [
        'all',
        [ '==', '$type', 'Point' ],
        [
          'in',
          'type',
          'town',
          'village',
          'hamlet',
          'suburb',
          'neighbourhood',
          'island'
        ]
      ],
      type: 'symbol',
      source: 'mapbox',
      id: 'place_label_other',
      paint: {
        'text-color': '#666',
        'text-halo-color': 'rgba(255,255,255,0.75)',
        'text-halo-width': 1,
        'text-halo-blur': 1
      },
      'source-layer': 'place_label'
    },
    {
      interactive: true,
      layout: {
        'text-field': '{name_en}',
        'text-font': [ 'Open Sans Bold', 'Arial Unicode MS Bold' ],
        'text-max-width': 10,
        'text-size': {
          stops: [ [ 3, 12 ], [ 8, 16 ] ]
        }
      },
      maxzoom: 16,
      filter: [ 'all', [ '==', '$type', 'Point' ], [ '==', 'type', 'city' ] ],
      type: 'symbol',
      source: 'mapbox',
      id: 'place_label_city',
      paint: {
        'text-color': '#666',
        'text-halo-color': 'rgba(255,255,255,0.75)',
        'text-halo-width': 1,
        'text-halo-blur': 1
      },
      'source-layer': 'place_label'
    },
    {
      interactive: true,
      layout: {
        'text-field': '{name_en}',
        'text-font': [ 'Open Sans Regular', 'Arial Unicode MS Regular' ],
        'text-max-width': 10,
        'text-size': {
          stops: [ [ 3, 14 ], [ 8, 22 ] ]
        }
      },
      maxzoom: 12,
      filter: [ '==', '$type', 'Point' ],
      type: 'symbol',
      source: 'mapbox',
      id: 'country_label',
      paint: {
        'text-color': '#666',
        'text-halo-color': 'rgba(255,255,255,0.75)',
        'text-halo-width': 1,
        'text-halo-blur': 1
      },
      'source-layer': 'country_label'
    }
  ]
}

export default mapStyle

ui/src/components/DataMap/MapUtils.js

export function getCenterCoords(records) {
  const lats = records.map(record => record.lat).filter(lat => lat)
  const longs = records.map(record => record.long).filter(long => long)
  const latCenter = (Math.min(...lats) + Math.max(...lats)) / 2
  const longCenter = (Math.min(...longs) + Math.max(...longs)) / 2
  return { latCenter, longCenter }
}

ui/src/components/DataMap/Overlays/InfoBox.js

import React, { memo } from 'react'
import { Typography } from '@material-ui/core'
import Card from '@material-ui/core/Card'
import { Row, Col } from '../../Grid'
import { titleCase, reformatDate } from '../../../utils/stringUtils'
import { renderParcelLink } from '../../../utils/tableUtils'
import { useTheme } from '@material-ui/core/styles'
import { isNull } from '../../Data/DataUtils'
import useStyles from '../../../theme/OverlayStyles'
import { useTranslation } from 'react-i18next'
import i18n from '../../../i18n'

/*
  InfoBox: render an information box map overlay
  props:
    items: an array with sets of icons and labels
    title: the header text
    directions: the first text to be displayed
*/

export const InfoBox = memo(props => {

  const theme = useTheme()
  const classes = useStyles(theme)
  const marker = props.selectedMarker
  const directions = props.directions
  const { t, ready: translationReady } = useTranslation(
    'List', /* i18next-parser needs string here */
    { useSuspense: false, i18n }
  )
  if (isNull(marker)) {
    return (
      <Card className={classes.infoBox} title='Eviction Details'>
        <Typography variant='body1'>{directions}</Typography>
      </Card>
    )
  }

  const corp_details = marker.be_specific_details 

  /* backend used to return formatted currency */ 
  /* until it does again maybe we can use this tiny function */ 
  const reformatDollar = (d) => {
    return '$' + d.toLocaleString()
  }

  if (!translationReady) return null

  /*formatters are stored in seaprate fields so that Array.filter() can throw out undefineds/nulls */
  const content = [
    /* fields for property info */
    {name: t('APN (Block/Lot)'), value: marker.block_lot},
    {name: t('Year Built'), value: marker.yr_built},
    {name: t('Zipcode'), value: marker.parc_zip},
    {name: t('Property Class Code'), value: marker.prop_class_code},
    {name: t('Type'), value: marker.type},
    {name: t('Date Filed'), value: marker.evict_date, formatter: reformatDate},
    {name: t('Rooms'), value: marker.rooms},
    {name: t('Stories'), value: marker.stories},
    {name: t('Land Value'), value: marker.assess_land_val, formatter: reformatDollar},
    {name: t('Improvement Value'), value: marker.assess_imp_val, formatter: reformatDollar},
    {name: t('Last Sales Price'), value: marker.curr_sales_price, formatter: reformatDollar},
    {name: t('Date Updated'), value: marker.update_date, formatter: reformatDate},
    /* fields for owner info */ 
    {name: t('Office Address'), value: marker.office_addresses?.[0]},
    {name: t('Date Registered'), value: marker.creation_date, formatter: reformatDate},
    {name: t('Corporation Number'), value: corp_details?.corporation_number},
    {name: t('Corporation Type'), value: corp_details?.corporation_type},
    {name: t('Status'), value: corp_details?.status},
    {name: t('Tax Base'), value: corp_details?.corporation_tax_base},
  ].filter(d => d.value) /* only keep the elements where the value exists */ 

  return (
    <Card className={classes.infoBox} title='Title'>
      { marker.block_lot
        ? <Row direction='row' justify='space-between'>
          <Typography variant='subtitle1' style={classes.lightColorLink}>
            {renderParcelLink(marker.block_lot, marker.addr)}
          </Typography>
        </Row>
        : <Row direction='row' justify='space-between'>
          <Typography variant='subtitle1'>{titleCase(marker.name)}</Typography>
        </Row>
      }
      { /*the content array above is iterated through here */
        content.map((d,i) => {
          return (
            <Row direction='row' justify='space-between' key={i}>
              <Col style={{marginRight: 20}}><Typography variant='body1' style={{fontWeight: 700}}>{d.name}</Typography></Col>
              <Col style={{marginLeft: 20}}><Typography variant='body1'>
                {typeof d.formatter === 'function' ? d.formatter(d.value) : d.value}
              </Typography></Col>
            </Row>
          )
        })
      }
    </Card>
  )
})

ui/src/components/DataMap/Overlays/Legend.js

import React, { memo } from 'react'
import { Typography } from '@material-ui/core'
import Card from '@material-ui/core/Card'
import { Row } from '../../Grid'
import { useTheme } from '@material-ui/core/styles'
import useStyles from '../../../theme/OverlayStyles'

/*
  Legend: render a legend map overlay
  props:
    items: an array with sets of icons and labels
    title: the header text
*/

const Legend = props => {

  const theme = useTheme()
  const classes = useStyles(theme)
  const items = props.items
  const title = props.title

  return (
    <Card className={classes.legend}>
      <Typography variant='subtitle1'>{title}</Typography>
      {
        items.map((item, index) => 
          <Row
            direction='row'
            alignItems='center'
            style={{marginBottom: 10}}
            key={item.label + index}>
            {item.icon}&nbsp;&nbsp;<Typography variant='body1'>{item.label}</Typography>
          </Row>
        )
      }
    </Card>
  )
}

export default memo(Legend)

ui/src/components/DataMap/Overlays/MapboxGLLayer.js

import { memo } from 'react'
import L from 'leaflet'
import {} from 'mapbox-gl-leaflet'
import PropTypes from 'prop-types'
import { GridLayer, withLeaflet } from 'react-leaflet'

class MapBoxGLLayer extends GridLayer {
  createLeafletElement(props) {
    return L.mapboxGL(props)
  }
}

/*
 * Props are the options supported by Mapbox Map object
 * Find options here:https://www.mapbox.com/mapbox-gl-js/api/#new-mapboxgl-map-options-
 */
MapBoxGLLayer.propTypes = {
  accessToken: PropTypes.string.isRequired,
  style: PropTypes.oneOfType([ PropTypes.string, PropTypes.object ])
}

MapBoxGLLayer.defaultProps = {
  style: 'mapbox://styles/mapbox/streets-v9',
  refreshExpiredTiles: false
}

export default memo(withLeaflet(MapBoxGLLayer))

ui/src/components/DataMap/Overlays/Overlay.js

import React from 'react'
import Control from 'react-leaflet-control'

const Overlay = props => 
  <Control position={props.position}>
    <>{props.children}</>
  </Control>

export default Overlay

ui/src/components/DataPage/DataPage.js

import React, { forwardRef } from 'react'
import PropTypes from 'prop-types'
import { Loading, Error, NoPage, NoData } from '../NotAvailable'
import Data, { isNull } from '../Data/Data'
import { Children } from '../Data/DataUtils'
export { sliceJson, isNull, isEmpty, urlParam } from '../Data/DataUtils'

/* 
  DataPage: a minimalist wrapper of the Data component suitable for conditionally rendering all content on a page
  Note: this component should not compose map or table components (that need extra time to load) as it defers loading of content
    and slows overall page load (which is pretty slow on mobile)
  props:
    fetch[]: an array of objects specifying data that needs to be fetched (required)
*/

const DataPage = forwardRef((props, ref) => {

  if (isNull(props)) return null

  const isDebugEnabled = props.isDebugEnabled ?? false

  return (
    <Data fetch={props.fetch} isDebugEnabled={isDebugEnabled}>
      <Data.Pending component={Loading} />
      <Data.Rejected component={Error} />
      <Data.NoData component={NoData} />
      <Data.Timeout component={NoPage} secondsToWait={20} />
      <Data.Fulfilled>
        <Children childrenToRender={props.children} ref={ref}/>
      </Data.Fulfilled>
    </Data>
  )

})

DataPage.propTypes = {
  fetch: PropTypes.arrayOf(PropTypes.shape({
    slice: PropTypes.string.isRequired,
    url: PropTypes.string.isRequired,
    select: PropTypes.func
  })).isRequired,
  isDebugEnabled: PropTypes.bool
}

export default DataPage

ui/src/components/DataSearchBar/SearchBar.js

import React, { useEffect, useCallback, useState, memo } from 'react'
import PropTypes from 'prop-types'
import { useDispatch, useSelector } from 'react-redux'
import { useHistory } from 'react-router-dom'
import { useTranslation } from 'react-i18next'
import { setSearchTerm } from '../../state/slices/searchStateSlice'
import { useTheme } from '@material-ui/core/styles'
import useStyles from '../../theme/SearchBarStyles'
import { CustomSearchInput } from './SearchBarInputUtils'
import { CustomDropdownList } from './SearchBarDropdownUtils'
import i18n from '../../i18n'
import Data from '../Data/Data'
import { searchSelector } from '../../state/slices/searchStateSlice'

/* 
  SearchBar: a search input with a formatted drop-down list
  props:
    location: a string specifiying whether this component is in the header or search results page (required)
*/

const SearchBar = props => {

  const location = props?.location || ''
  const theme = useTheme()
  const classes = useStyles(theme)

  /* Set up hooks */
  const dispatch = useDispatch()
  const history = useHistory()
  const [isInitialLoad, setIsInitialLoad] = useState(true)
  const [rawSearchTerm, setRawSearchTerm] = useState('') 
  const { t, ready: translationReady } = useTranslation(
    'Search', /* i18next-parser needs string here */
    { useSuspense: false, i18n }
  )

  /* Read state from the Redux store */
  const searchTerm = useSelector(state => state.search.searchTerm)
  const resultJson = useSelector(searchSelector)
  const results = Object.assign([], resultJson) /* adds missing Array __proto__ */

  /* get raw user input as state */ 
  const handleSearchTextChange = e => {
    const {value} = e.target
    setRawSearchTerm(value)
  }

  /* Feed debounced user input into Redux store */ 
  /* updating state and updating store need to be separated i think because setState() is asynchronous */
  useEffect(() => {
    const timer = setTimeout(() => {
      /* only update searchterm if there is actually something in the search bar */
      /* without this, when the app navigates to the search results page, an empty list shows */ 
      if(rawSearchTerm.length > 0) dispatch(setSearchTerm(rawSearchTerm))
      if (isInitialLoad) setIsInitialLoad(false)
    }, 250)
    return () => clearTimeout(timer)
  }, [rawSearchTerm, dispatch, isInitialLoad])
  

  /* Navigate to the Search Results page on Submit */
  const handleSearchSubmit = useCallback(e => {
    if(rawSearchTerm.length === 0) return null /* if the user hasn't typed anything don't navigate to the search results page */ 
    dispatch(setSearchTerm(rawSearchTerm)) /* update what the searchterm should be, bypassing the debounce. Without this the results pages shows an outdated result */ 
    history.push('/searchresults') /* Redirect to searchresults page */
    // eslint-disable-next-line
  }, [rawSearchTerm] )

  /* This is a hack to prevent the drop-down bar from staying open after an item is clicked */
  const handleResultClick = () => {
    setRawSearchTerm('')
  }

  /* Define when dropdown list can render */
  const resultsReady =
    !isInitialLoad &&
    typeof searchTerm === 'string' &&
    rawSearchTerm.length > 0 &&
    results.length > 0 &&
    history.location.pathname !== '/searchresults'

  /* Return appropriate content for error conditions  */
  if (!translationReady) return null

  /* Render the search bar */
  return (
    <div className={classes.root}>
      {typeof searchTerm === 'string' && searchTerm.length > 0 &&
        <Data fetch={[{
          slice: 'search', url: `api/search?q=${encodeURIComponent(searchTerm)}`,
          select: j => j.results}]} isDebugEnabled={false}>
        </Data>
      }
      <div className='wrapper-div'>
        <div className={location === '/' ? 'search-bar' : 'search-bar-header'}>
          <form className="search-form"> 
            <CustomSearchInput
              value={rawSearchTerm}
              placeholderText={t('Search for an address, owner, or neighborhood in San Francisco')}
              handleChange={handleSearchTextChange}
              handleSearchSubmit={handleSearchSubmit}
              handleResultClick={handleResultClick}
            />
          </form>
        </div>
        {
          resultsReady && 
            <div className={classes.searchResults}>
              <CustomDropdownList
                data={results}
                handleResultClick={handleResultClick}
              />
            </div>
        }
      </div>
    </div>
  )
}

SearchBar.propTypes = {
  location: PropTypes.string.isRequired
}

SearchBar.defaultProps = {
  location: ''
}

export default memo(SearchBar)

ui/src/components/DataSearchBar/SearchBarDropdownUtils.js

import React from 'react'
import { Link as RouterLink } from 'react-router-dom'
import { List, ListItem, ListItemText, ListItemIcon } from '@material-ui/core'
import { titleCase } from '../../utils/stringUtils'
import HomeOutlinedIcon from '@material-ui/icons/HomeOutlined'
import RoomOutlinedIcon from '@material-ui/icons/RoomOutlined'
import BusinessIcon from '@material-ui/icons/Business'
import useMediaQuery from '@material-ui/core/useMediaQuery'
import Typography from '@material-ui/core/Typography'
import { isNull } from '../Data/DataUtils'

const MAX_DROPDOWN_SEARCH_RESULTS = 5

/* ------------- SEARCH BAR DROPDOWN RESULT LIST HELPERS ------------------- */

const CustomListIcon = props => (
  <ListItemIcon color="secondary" className='result-icon'>
    {props.category === 'PARCEL' ? <HomeOutlinedIcon/> 
      : props.category === 'NEIGHBORHOOD_SUMMARY' ? <RoomOutlinedIcon/> 
        : props.category === 'BUSINESS_ENTITY' ? <BusinessIcon/>
          : null}
  </ListItemIcon>
)

export const CustomDropdownList = (props) => {

  const { data, handleResultClick } = props
  const isMediumDisplay = useMediaQuery('(min-width: 800px')

  const trimmed_data = data.slice(0, MAX_DROPDOWN_SEARCH_RESULTS)

  if (isNull(trimmed_data)) return null

  return (
    <List style={{margin: 0, padding: 0, display: 'inline' }}>
      {trimmed_data.map((item, index) => (
        <ListItem
          key={index}
          component={RouterLink}
          to={item.details_url}
          onClick={handleResultClick}
          className='search-results-item'
          style={{
            display: 'flex',
            justifyContent: 'space-between',
            textDecoration: 'none!important',
            '&::hover': { textDecoration: 'underline' }
          }}>
          <div style={{
            display: 'flex',
            alignItems: 'flex-start',
            flexDirection: 'row'
          }}>
            <CustomListIcon category={item.category} />
            <ListItemText inset
              disableTypography
              style={{ padding: 0, margin: 0, color: 'black'}}
              primary={
                <Typography variant='body2'>
                  {titleCase(item.label)}
                </Typography>
              }
            />
          </div>
          {isMediumDisplay &&
            <div style={{ alignItems: 'flex-end' }}>
              <ListItemText inset primary={
                <Typography variant='body2' className = 'searchTypeText' style={{
                  textDecoration: 'none!important',
                  '&::hover': { textDecoration: 'underline' }
                }}>
                  {item.category_label.toUpperCase()}
                </Typography>
              }
              />
            </div>
          }
        </ListItem>
      ))}
    </List>
  )
}

ui/src/components/DataSearchBar/SearchBarInputUtils.js

import React from 'react'
import { TextField, InputAdornment, Typography, IconButton } from '@material-ui/core'
import { useSelector } from 'react-redux'
/* Mui icons for search bar */
import CloseIcon from '@material-ui/icons/Close'
import SearchIcon from '@material-ui/icons/Search'

/* ------------- SEARCH BAR TEXT INPUT HELPERS ------------------- */

/* icons in the far right of search bar: they render as an "x" and a magnifying glass */
export const CustomSearchIcons = ({handleResultClick, handleSearchSubmit}) => {
  
  const value = useSelector(state => state.search.searchTerm )
  
  return (
    <>

      {/* conditionally render the "X" that closes the dropdown */}
      {value.length > 0 && 
        <>
          <IconButton aria-label="cancel search" disableRipple onClick={handleResultClick} tabIndex={-1}>
            <CloseIcon style={{color: 'lightgrey'}} />
          </IconButton>

          <Typography  
            tabIndex={-1}
            style={{color: 'lightgrey', fontSize: '1.5em', fontWeight: '300'}}>|
          </Typography>
        </>
      }

      <IconButton 
        tabIndex={0}
        className='focus-dark'
        aria-label="search" disableRipple onClick={handleSearchSubmit}>
        <SearchIcon />
      </IconButton>

    </>
  )
}

/* helper function for search bar icons */
const CustomSearchAdornment = ({ handleResultClick, handleSearchSubmit }) => (
  <InputAdornment position="end" tabIndex={-1}> 
    <CustomSearchIcons 
      handleResultClick={handleResultClick} 
      handleSearchSubmit={handleSearchSubmit}/>
  </InputAdornment>
)

/* primary site search bar */
export const CustomSearchInput = ({ value, handleChange, placeholderText, handleResultClick, handleSearchSubmit }) => {

  return (
    <TextField
      variant="outlined"
      aria-label="Search for an address, owner, or neighborhood in San Francisco"
      placeholder={placeholderText}
      id="search-item" // keep this. important for styles. find out why
      fullWidth
      autoFocus
      autoComplete="off"
      value={value}
      onChange={handleChange}
      onKeyPress={e => {
        if(e.key === 'Enter'){
          e.preventDefault() 
          handleSearchSubmit()
        }
      }
      }      
      InputProps={{
        endAdornment: 
          <CustomSearchAdornment 
            handleResultClick={handleResultClick} 
            handleSearchSubmit={handleSearchSubmit}
          />,
        className: 'input'
      }}
    />)
}

ui/src/components/DataTable/AdornedTable/AdornedTable.js

import React, { useState, forwardRef, useMemo, useEffect, memo } from 'react'
import { Link as RouterLink } from 'react-router-dom'
import PropTypes from 'prop-types'
import SearchIcon from '@material-ui/icons/Search'
import Notes from '@material-ui/icons/Notes'
import ArrowRight from '@material-ui/icons/ArrowRight'
import ArrowDropDown from '@material-ui/icons/ArrowDropDown'
import GetAppOutlinedIcon from '@material-ui/icons/GetAppOutlined'
import TextField from '@material-ui/core/TextField'
import Button from '@material-ui/core/Button'
import Card from '@material-ui/core/Card'
import Typography from '@material-ui/core/Typography'
import { useTheme } from '@material-ui/core/styles'
import Box from '@material-ui/core/Box'
import { isNull, isEmpty } from '../../Data/DataUtils'
import { Row } from '../../Grid'
import Link from '@material-ui/core/Link'
import useStyles from '../../../theme/ListStyles'
import { useTranslation } from 'react-i18next'
import i18n from '../../../i18n'
import BaseTable from './BaseTable/BaseTable'
import { CSVLink } from 'react-csv'
import { toUnderscore } from '../../../utils/stringUtils'
import InputAdornment from '@material-ui/core/InputAdornment'
import { stableSort, useMemoCompare } from '../../../utils/dataUtils'
/* 
  AdornedTable: a version of the BaseTable component with header and footer components
  props:
    rows[]: an array providing row data for the underlying grid component (required)
    onSearchFilter: called when the table search field changes returning a filtered list
*/

const StyledTable = forwardRef((props, ref) => {

  const theme = useTheme()
  const classes = useStyles(theme)
  const [searchTerm, setSearchTerm] = useState('')
  const [debouncedSearchTerm, setDebouncedSearchTerm] = useState('')
  const onSearchFilter = props.onSearchFilter
  const SearchHint = props.searchHint
  const aboutData = props.aboutData
  const csvFileName = props.csvFileName ||
    'please_add_csvFileName_property_to_DataTable'
  const sortModel = props.sortModel // sortModel={[{ field: 'evict_date', sort: 'desc' }]}
  
  /* only update rows if the literal values have changed */ 
  /* with an exception for the randomly-generated keyField */ 
  const rows = useMemoCompare(props.rows, (prev, next) => {
    if(!prev) return false
    const prevBase = prev.map(d => delete d.keyField)
    const nextBase = next.map(d => delete d.keyField)
    return (JSON.stringify(prevBase) === JSON.stringify(nextBase))
  })

  const { t, ready: translationReady } = useTranslation(
    'List', /* i18next-parser needs string here */
    { useSuspense: false, i18n }
  )

  /* Set final state for TextField input changes post-debounce */
  useEffect(() => {
    const timer = setTimeout(() => setDebouncedSearchTerm(searchTerm), 1000)
    return () => clearTimeout(timer)
  }, [searchTerm])

  /* Initial sort of the data per the sortModel, if provided */
  const sortedRows = useMemo(() => {
    let _rows = rows
    if (!isEmpty(sortModel)) {
      sortModel.forEach(s => {
        const field = s.field
        const compare = s.sort === 'asc'
          ? (a, b) => {
            if (a[field] < b[field]) return -1
            if (a[field] > b[field]) return 1
            return 0
          }
          : (a, b) => {
            if (a[field] > b[field]) return -1
            if (a[field] < b[field]) return 1
            return 0
          }
        // eslint-disable-next-line
        _rows = stableSort(_rows, compare)
      })
    }
    else {
      _rows = rows
    }
    return _rows
    // eslint-disable-next-line
  }, [rows])

  /* Basic implementation of filtering table rows with a search term */
  const filteredRows = useMemo(() => ({
    rows: debouncedSearchTerm
      ? sortedRows.filter(
        x => Object.values(x).filter(
          y => {
            if (typeof y === 'string')
              return y.toLowerCase().indexOf(debouncedSearchTerm.toLowerCase()) >= 0
            else if (typeof y === 'number')
              return y.toString() === debouncedSearchTerm
            else return false
          }
        ).length > 0
      )
      : rows
      // eslint-disable-next-line
  }), [debouncedSearchTerm, sortedRows])
  
  /* Call the onSearchFilter event handler if present */
  useEffect(() => {
    if (typeof onSearchFilter === 'function') {
      onSearchFilter(filteredRows.rows)
    }
    // eslint-disable-next-line
  }, [filteredRows])

  if (isNull(props)) return null
  if (!translationReady) return null

  /* Component to define the content of the toolbar at the top of the table */
  const Toolbar = memo(() => {

    /* Set intermediate state for TextField input changes pre-debounce */
    const handleTextFieldChange = e => {
      const newTerm = typeof e.target.value === 'string' ? e.target.value : ''
      setSearchTerm(newTerm)
    }

    /* Flatten and reformat non-string object data for proper display in CSV */
    const csvRows = useMemo(() => {
      return filteredRows.rows.map(row => {
        return ({...row,
          primary_evictor: row.primary_evictor?.name,
          match_quality: `Method: ${row.match_quality?.addr_match_method}, Subdivision: ${row.match_quality?.did_subdivision_occur}`
        })
      })
      // eslint-disable-next-line
    },[filteredRows.rows])

    return (
      <Row direction='row' justify='space-between' className='header'>
        <div style={{
          display: 'flex',
          flexDirection: 'row',
          alignItems: 'flex-end',
          marginBottom: 3
        }}>
          {(
            (!isEmpty(csvRows) && Array.isArray(csvRows)) &&
            (typeof csvFileName === 'string' && csvFileName.length > 0)
          ) && <CSVLink
            data={csvRows}
            filename={toUnderscore(csvFileName) + '.csv'}>
            <Row direction='row' wrap='nowrap'>
              <GetAppOutlinedIcon htmlColor={theme.palette.common.OFFWHITE}/>
              <Typography variant='body1'>Download as CSV</Typography>
            </Row>
          </CSVLink>}
        </div>
        <div>
          <div style={{marginRight: 20, fontWeight: 100}}>
            { searchTerm !== '' && SearchHint && <SearchHint/> }
          </div>
          <TextField
            inputRef={input =>
              input?.value && /* If input and its value property exist */
              searchTerm !== debouncedSearchTerm && /* If a debounce is in progress */
              input.focus() /* Steal focus */
            }
            autoComplete='off'
            aria-label={t('search the table')}
            placeholder={t('Search Table')}
            size='small'
            margin='dense'
            variant="standard"
            onChange={handleTextFieldChange}
            value={searchTerm}
            ref={ref}
            InputProps={{
              startAdornment: (
                <InputAdornment>
                  <SearchIcon htmlColor={theme.palette.common.OFFWHITE} />
                </InputAdornment>
              )}}
          />
          <SearchIcon />
        </div>
      </Row>
    )
  })

  function About() {

    const [showAbout, setShowAbout] = useState(false)
    const handleClick = e => setShowAbout(!showAbout)

    return (
      !isNull(aboutData) &&
      <div style={{display: 'flex', flexDirection: 'column', marginTop: 10}}>
        <Button
          className={classes.aboutButton}
          color="primary"
          size="small"
          onClick={handleClick}>
          <Row direction='row' alignItems='center' wrap='nowrap'>
            <Notes/>
            <Typography variant='body1' style={{
              flexWrap: 'nowrap',
              whiteSpace: 'nowrap'
            }}>
              &nbsp;{t('ABOUT THIS DATA')}&nbsp;
            </Typography>
            { showAbout ? <ArrowDropDown/> : <ArrowRight/> }
          </Row>
        </Button>
        <Box display={showAbout ? 'block' : 'none'}>
          <Card className={classes.aboutCard}>
            <Row direction='row' alignItems='center'>
              <Typography variant='body1'>{t('Source:')}&nbsp;</Typography>
              { !isNull(aboutData.href)
                ? <Typography variant='body1'>
                  <Link
                    component={RouterLink}
                    underline='always'
                    style={{
                      color: theme.palette.common.OFFWHITE,
                      backgroundColor: '#302742',
                      '& a::hover': { textDecoration: 'underline' }
                    }}
                    to={{pathname: aboutData.href}}>
                    {aboutData.source}
                  </Link>
                </Typography>
                : <Typography variant='body1'>
                  {aboutData.source}
                </Typography>
              }
            </Row>
            <Row direction='row' alignItems='flex-start'>
              <Typography variant='body1'>{t('Notes:')}&nbsp;</Typography>
              <Typography variant='body1'>{aboutData.notes}</Typography>
            </Row>
          </Card>
        </Box>
      </div>
    )
  }
  return (
    <div
      className={props.className}
      style={{ contain: 'layout' }}
      tag='allow the browser to optimize rendering performance'>
      <div
        style={{ width: '100%' }}
        tag='DataGrid is a flex container, so it needs a parent with a set width'>
        {/* Replace DataGrid with a Table to gain needed flexibility */}
        <Toolbar/>
        <BaseTable
          classes={classes}
          { ...props }
          { ...filteredRows }
          about={About}
        />
      </div>
    </div>
  )

})

StyledTable.propTypes = {
  rows: PropTypes.array.isRequired,
  columns: PropTypes.array.isRequired
}

export default memo(StyledTable)

ui/src/components/DataTable/AdornedTable/BaseTable/BaseTable.js

import React, { useMemo } from 'react'
import PropTypes from 'prop-types'
import { withStyles } from '@material-ui/core/styles'
import Table from '@material-ui/core/Table'
import TableBody from '@material-ui/core/TableBody'
import TableCell from '@material-ui/core/TableCell'
import TableContainer from '@material-ui/core/TableContainer'
import TableHead from '@material-ui/core/TableHead'
import TablePagination from '@material-ui/core/TablePagination'
import TableRow from '@material-ui/core/TableRow'
import TableSortLabel from '@material-ui/core/TableSortLabel'
import Paper from '@material-ui/core/Paper'
import { useTheme } from '@material-ui/core/styles'
import useStyles from '../../../../theme/ListStyles'
import { Row } from '../../../Grid'
import { isEmpty, isNull } from '../../../Data/DataUtils'
import useMediaQuery from '@material-ui/core/useMediaQuery'
import { stableSort } from '../../../../utils/dataUtils'

/* 
  BaseTable: a version of Material UI's Table component opinionated for style and functionality
  props:
    rows[]: an array providing row data for the underlying grid component (required)
*/

function TableHeader(props) {
  const theme = useTheme()
  const classes = useStyles(theme)
  if (isNull(props)) return null
  const columns = props.columns
  const { order, orderBy, onRequestSort } = props
  const createSortHandler = property => event => {
    onRequestSort(event, property)
  }

  const StyledTableHeaderCell = withStyles(() => ({
    body: { fontSize: 16, padding: 8 },
  }))(TableCell)

  return (
    <TableHead>
      <TableRow>
        {columns?.map(headCell => (
          <StyledTableHeaderCell
            style={props.headerStyles}
            className={classes.headerCell}
            variant='head'
            key={headCell.field}
            align={headCell.numeric ? 'right' : 'left'}
            padding={headCell.disablePadding ? 'none' : 'default'}
            sortDirection={orderBy === headCell.field ? order : false}>
            <TableSortLabel
              active={orderBy === headCell.field}
              direction={orderBy === headCell.field ? order : 'asc'}
              onClick={createSortHandler(headCell.field)}>
              {headCell.headerName}
            </TableSortLabel>
          </StyledTableHeaderCell>
        ))}
      </TableRow>
    </TableHead>
  )
}

TableHeader.propTypes = {
  classes: PropTypes.object.isRequired,
  columns: PropTypes.array.isRequired,
  onRequestSort: PropTypes.func.isRequired,
  order: PropTypes.oneOf(['asc', 'desc']).isRequired,
  orderBy: PropTypes.string.isRequired,
}

export default function BaseTable(props) {
  const theme = useTheme()
  const classes = useStyles(theme)
  const rows = props?.rows
  const columns = props?.columns
  const About = props?.about
  const paginationPageSize = props?.paginationPageSize
  const sortModel = props?.sortModel //[{ field: 'evict_date', sort: 'desc' }]
  //const sortingOrder = props?.sortingOrder //['desc', 'asc', null]
  const [order, setOrder] = React.useState(sortModel?.[0]?.sort || 'asc')
  const [orderBy, setOrderBy] = React.useState(sortModel?.[0]?.field || '')
  const [selected, setSelected] = React.useState([])
  const [page, setPage] = React.useState(0)
  const [rowsPerPage, setRowsPerPage] = React.useState(paginationPageSize || 10)
  const breakpointMd = useMediaQuery(theme.breakpoints.up('md'))
  const rowsPerPageLabel = breakpointMd ? 'Rows per page:' : 'Rows:'

  if (isEmpty(rows)) return null

  function descendingComparator(a, b, orderBy) {
    const column = columns.filter(d => d.field === orderBy)[0]
    if (!a[orderBy] || !column?.dataSelector) return 0
    const aVal = a[orderBy] ? a[orderBy] : column?.dataSelector(a)
    const bVal = b[orderBy] ? b[orderBy] : column?.dataSelector(b)

    if (bVal < aVal) return -1
    if (bVal > aVal) return 1
    return 0
  }
  
  function getComparator(order, orderBy) {
    return order === 'desc'
      ? (a, b) => descendingComparator(a, b, orderBy)
      : (a, b) => -descendingComparator(a, b, orderBy)
  }

  const handleRequestSort = (event, property) => {
    const isAsc = orderBy === property && order === 'asc'
    setOrder(isAsc ? 'desc' : 'asc')
    setOrderBy(property)
  }

  const handleSelectAllClick = event => {
    if (event.target.checked) {
      const newSelecteds = rows.map(n => n.name)
      setSelected(newSelecteds)
      return
    }
    setSelected([])
  }

  const handleChangePage = (event, newPage) => {
    setPage(newPage)
  }

  const handleChangeRowsPerPage = event => {
    setRowsPerPage(parseInt(event.target.value, 10))
    setPage(0)
  }

  const emptyRows = 0

  const MemoizedRow = props => {
    const cellStyles = props?.cellStyles
    const row = props?.row
    const columns = props?.columns
    const MemoizedColumns = useMemo(
      () => props =>
        columns?.map(column => {
          let displayValue = ''
          if (typeof column.valueFormatter === 'function') {
            displayValue = column.valueFormatter({ value: row[column.field] })
          } else if (typeof column.renderCell === 'function') {
            displayValue = column.renderCell({ row })
          } else {
            displayValue = row[column.field]
          }
          return (
            <TableCell
              style={cellStyles}
              className={classes.tableCell}
              variant='body'
              component='th'
              scope='row'
              padding='none'
              key={column.field}>
              {displayValue}
            </TableCell>
          )
        }),
      [columns, row, cellStyles]
    )

    return (
      <TableRow hover role='checkbox' tabIndex={-1} key={row?.name}>
        <MemoizedColumns />
      </TableRow>
    )
  }

  return (
    <div className={classes.root}>
      <Paper className={classes.paper}>
        <TableContainer>
          <Table className={classes.table} aria-labelledby='tableTitle' aria-label='enhanced table'>
            <TableHeader
              classes={classes}
              numSelected={selected.length}
              order={order}
              orderBy={orderBy}
              onSelectAllClick={handleSelectAllClick}
              onRequestSort={handleRequestSort}
              rowCount={rows.length || 0}
              columns={props?.columns}
            />
            <TableBody>
              {stableSort(rows, getComparator(order, orderBy))
                .slice(page * rowsPerPage, page * rowsPerPage + rowsPerPage)
                .map((row, index) => (
                  <MemoizedRow key={index} 
                    row={row} columns={columns} 
                    cellStyles={props.cellStyles}/>
                ))}
              {emptyRows > 0 && (
                <TableRow>
                  <TableCell />
                </TableRow>
              )}
            </TableBody>
          </Table>
        </TableContainer>
      </Paper>
      <Row justify='space-between' wrap='nowrap'>
        <About />
        <TablePagination
          className={classes.tablePagination}
          classes={{ menuItem: classes.paginationOption }}
          style={{
            backgroundColor: theme.palette.common.EGGPLANT,
            color: theme.palette.common.OFFWHITE,
            '& svg': { color: theme.palette.common.OFFWHITE },
          }}
          rowsPerPageOptions={[5, 10, 25, 50, 100]}
          labelRowsPerPage={rowsPerPageLabel}
          component='div'
          count={rows.length}
          rowsPerPage={rowsPerPage}
          page={page}
          onChangePage={handleChangePage}
          onChangeRowsPerPage={handleChangeRowsPerPage}
        />
      </Row>
    </div>
  )
}

ui/src/components/DataTable/DataTable.js

import React, { forwardRef } from 'react'
import { v4 } from 'uuid'
import PropTypes from 'prop-types'
import { useSelector } from 'react-redux'
import AdornedTable from './AdornedTable/AdornedTable'
import { TableLoading, Error, TableNoData } from '../NotAvailable'
import Data, { isNull, isEmpty, sliceJson, selected } from '../Data/Data'
export { sliceJson, isNull, isEmpty, urlParam } from '../Data/DataUtils'

/* 
  DataTable: an optionally data-enabled version of the StyledTable component
  props:
    columns[]: an object specifying column configuration (required at this time)
    select[]: an object with functions that select the location of row and column data with JSON data (optional in theory)
    rows[]: an array providing row data for the underlying grid component (optional)
    fetch[]: an object specifying data that needs to be fetched (optional)
    Note: either the fetch or rows prop must be provided
*/

const DataTable = forwardRef((props, ref) => {

  const firstFetchItem = props.fetch?.[0] ?? { slice: null, url: null, select: null }
  const { slice, url } = firstFetchItem 
  const json = useSelector(sliceJson(slice))
  if (isNull(props)) return null
  const rows = props.rows ?? []
  const columns = props.columns ?? []
  const isDebugEnabled = props.isDebugEnabled ?? false
  const rowSelect = props.select?.row
  const columnSelect = props.select?.column
  const keyField = props.keyField ?? null
  let passDownRows = []
  let passDownColumns = []
  let passDownFetch = null  

  /* Option 1: this component accepts rows and columns props and passes them to StyledTable */
  /* Option 2: this component accepts a fetch prop and passes fetch to Data and then the data to StyledTable when available */
  if (!isEmpty(rows) && !isEmpty(columns)) {

    if (isDebugEnabled) console.info('%c DataTable: populating the table with data and columns props', 'color: green')
    passDownRows = rows
    passDownColumns = columns
    passDownFetch = null
  }
  else {
    
    if (isNull(slice) || isNull(url)) {
      console.error('%c DataTable: either the rows property or fetch property must be valid')
    }

    const isPreFetch = isEmpty(json)
    if (isPreFetch) {
      if (isDebugEnabled) console.info(`%c Fetching slice '${slice}' from '${url}'`, 'color: green')
    }
    else {
      if (isDebugEnabled) console.info('%c Populating the table with fetched data', 'color: green')

      /* The data can be either an object or array in JSON */
      let rowDataJSON = selected(json, rowSelect)

      /* Determine row data to pass down to the grid component */
      const rowDataAsArray = Object.assign([], rowDataJSON)
      passDownRows = rowDataAsArray
      
      /* Determine column data to pass down to the grid component */
      /* TODO: data-driven/auto-generated columns needs a bit more work and isn't used at this time */
      if (isEmpty(columns)) {
        /* Data-Driven Columns */
        const columnDataJSON = selected(json, columnSelect)
        if (!isEmpty(columnDataJSON)) {
          if (isDebugEnabled) console.info('%c DataTable: using data-driven column definitions from JSON column data', 'color: green')
          passDownColumns = columnDataJSON
        }
        else {
          if (isDebugEnabled) console.info('%c DataTable: using auto-generated column definitions extracted from JSON row data', 'color: green')
          const columns = Object.keys(rowDataAsArray[0]).map(x => ({ field: x, headerName: x}) )
          const filteredColumns = !isEmpty(columns) ? columns.filter(x => columns.includes(x.field)) : columns
          passDownColumns = filteredColumns
        }

      }
      else {
        /* Manually-Defined Columns */
        if (isDebugEnabled) console.info('%c DataTable: using manually-defined column definitions from props', 'color: green')
        passDownColumns = columns
      }
    }

    passDownFetch = [firstFetchItem]
  }

  /* Add an ID field as required by @material-ui/data-grid */
  /* Revisit if the API ends up returning an ID field */
  /* Add a key either based on the keyField prop or a randomly generated one (keyField prop is far preferred) */
  passDownRows = passDownRows && passDownRows.map((x,i) => ({ ...x, id: i, key: keyField ? x[keyField] : v4()}))

  return (
    <Data {...props} fetch={passDownFetch} isDebugEnabled={isDebugEnabled}>
      <Data.Pending component={TableLoading} />
      <Data.Rejected component={Error} />
      <Data.NoData><TableNoData {...props} /></Data.NoData>
      <Data.Timeout component={TableNoData} secondsToWait={10} />
      <Data.Fulfilled>
        <AdornedTable
          {...props}
          className={props.className}
          columns={passDownColumns}
          rows={passDownRows}
          title={props.title}
          ref={ref}
        />
      </Data.Fulfilled>
    </Data>
  )

})

DataTable.propTypes = {
  fetch: PropTypes.arrayOf(PropTypes.shape({
    slice: PropTypes.string.isRequired,
    url: PropTypes.string.isRequired,
    select: PropTypes.func
  })),
  rows: PropTypes.arrayOf(PropTypes.object),
  columns: PropTypes.array,
  select: PropTypes.objectOf(PropTypes.func),
  isDebugEnabled: PropTypes.bool,
  noDataMessage: PropTypes.string,
  aboutData: PropTypes.object
}

export default DataTable

ui/src/components/EvictionList.js

import React, { memo } from 'react'
import { useSelector } from 'react-redux'
import { Typography } from '@material-ui/core'
import { isEmpty, isNull, sliceJson } from './Data/DataUtils'
import DataTable from './DataTable/DataTable'
import { reformatDate, titleCase } from '../utils/stringUtils'
import { renderParcelLink, renderOwnerLink } from '../utils/tableUtils'
import ExpandMoreIcon from '@material-ui/icons/ExpandMore'
import Accordion from '@material-ui/core/Accordion'
import AccordionSummary from '@material-ui/core/AccordionSummary'
import AccordionDetails from '@material-ui/core/AccordionDetails'
import { useTranslation } from 'react-i18next'
import i18n from '../i18n'
import { useTheme } from '@material-ui/core/styles'
import useStyles from '../theme/ListStyles'
import { Row } from '../components/Grid'

/*
  EvictionList: render a table with a list of evictions
  props:
    title: 
    subTitle: 
    noDataMessage: 
    evictions: slice with the FULL LIST of evictions
*/

const Evictionlist = props => {

  /* Data should contain owner and address URL links */
  const evictions = useSelector(sliceJson(props.evictionSlice))
  const title = props.title
  const subTitle = props.subTitle
  const noDataMessage = props.noDataMessage
  const theme = useTheme()
  const classes = useStyles(theme)

  const { t, ready: translationReady } = useTranslation(
    'Evictions', /* i18next-parser needs string here */
    { useSuspense: false, i18n }
  )

  if (isEmpty(evictions)) {
    return (
      <>
        <Typography variant='h2'>
          {typeof title === 'string' && title.length > 0 && title}
        </Typography>
        <Typography variant='body1'>{noDataMessage}</Typography>
      </>
    )
  }

  if (!translationReady) return null

  const AttributedEvictor = props => {

    const primaryEvictorName = props?.primaryEvictorName
    const primaryEvictorType = props?.primaryEvictorType
    const secondaryEvictors = props?.secondaryEvictors

    return (
      <Accordion
        className={classes.accordionInTable}
        elevation={0}>
        <AccordionSummary
          className={classes.accordionSummary}
          expandIcon={<ExpandMoreIcon />}
          aria-controls="panel1a-content"
          id="panel1a-header"
        >
          <Typography variant='body2'>
            {renderOwnerLink(primaryEvictorName, primaryEvictorType)}
            {!isNull(primaryEvictorName) && secondaryEvictors.length > 0 &&
            <>
              <br/>
              {t('(and')}&nbsp;
              <strong>{secondaryEvictors.length}</strong>
              &nbsp;{t('more)')}
            </>
            }
          </Typography>
        </AccordionSummary>
        <AccordionDetails style={{
          display: 'flex',
          flexDirection: 'column',
          flexWrap: 'wrap',
          whiteSpace: 'normal'
        }}>
          {secondaryEvictors?.map(evictor =>
            <Row key={evictor}>
              <Typography variant='body2'>{titleCase(evictor)}</Typography>
            </Row>
          )}
        </AccordionDetails>
      </Accordion>
    )
  }

  /* Count occurences of the data for each column */
  const countAddr = evictions.filter(
    row => typeof row.addr !== 'undefined' ||
    typeof row.location?.addr !== 'undefined' ||
    typeof row.evict_addr_orig !== 'undefined'
  ).length
  const primaryEvictors = evictions.filter(row =>
    typeof row.primary_evictor?.name === 'string')
  const countEvictors = primaryEvictors.length
  const countType = evictions.filter(row => typeof row.type === 'string').length
  const countNumOtherParc =
    evictions.filter(row => (typeof row.num_other_parc === 'number' &&
      row.num_other_parc > 0) ||
      (typeof row.location?.num_other_parc === 'number' &&
      row.location?.num_other_parc > 0)).length

  /* Display columns with at least one data item */
  const columns = []

  columns.push({
    field: 'evict_date',
    headerName: 'Date',
    flex: 1.5,
    valueFormatter: p => reformatDate(p.value, true)
  })

  countAddr > 0 && columns.push({
    field: 'addr',
    headerName: 'Address',
    flex: 2,
    renderCell: p => renderParcelLink(
      p.row.block_lot || p.row.location?.block_lot,
      titleCase(p.row.addr || p.row.location?.addr || p.row.evict_addr_orig)
    ),
    dataSelector: d => d.addr || d.location?.addr || d.evict_addr_orig
  })

  countEvictors > 0 && columns.push({
    field: 'evictor_name',
    headerName: 'Attributed Evictor(s)',
    flex: 3,
    renderCell: p => {
      const primaryEvictorName = p.row.primary_evictor?.name
      const primaryEvictorType = p.row.primary_evictor?.linked_be?.__typename
      const secondaryEvictors = isEmpty(p.row.extra_evictors)
        ? []
        : p.row.extra_evictors.map(e => renderOwnerLink(e.evictor_name, e.evictor_type))

      if (isNull(primaryEvictorName)) return 'Unknown'

      return (
        isEmpty(secondaryEvictors)
          ? <Typography variant='body2'>
            {renderOwnerLink(primaryEvictorName, primaryEvictorType)}
          </Typography>
          : <AttributedEvictor
            primaryEvictorName={primaryEvictorName}
            primaryEvictorType={primaryEvictorType}
            secondaryEvictors={secondaryEvictors}
          />
      )
    },
    dataSelector: d => d.primary_evictor?.name       
  })

  countType > 0 &&
    columns.push({
      field: 'type',
      headerName: 'Eviction Type',
      flex: 1.5,
      valueFormatter: p => (p.value ? p.value : 'Unknown'),
      dataSelector: d => d.type,
    })

  countNumOtherParc > 0 &&
    columns.push({
      field: 'notes',
      headerName: 'Notes',
      flex: 2,
      renderCell: p => {
        const numAdditionalParc =
          (p.row.num_other_parc || 0) + (p.row.location?.num_other_parc || 0)
        if (numAdditionalParc <= 0) return ''
        return (
          <Typography variant='body2'>
            {t('This eviction matches with {{count}} other parcels.', {
              count: numAdditionalParc,
            })}
          </Typography>
        )
      },
    })

  return (
    <>
      <Typography variant='h2'>
        {typeof title === 'string' && title.length > 0 && title}
      </Typography>
      <Typography variant='body1'>
        {subTitle !== null && subTitle}
      </Typography>
      <DataTable
        sortModel={[{ field: 'evict_date', sort: 'desc' }]}
        sortingOrder={['desc', 'asc', null]}
        name='evictions'
        {...props}
        rows={evictions}
        columns={columns}
      />
    </>
  )

}

export default memo(Evictionlist)

ui/src/components/FeedbackIFrame.js

import React, { useState } from 'react'
import { Row, Col } from './Grid'
import { makeStyles } from '@material-ui/styles'
import { useMediaQuery } from 'react-responsive'

const iframeURL = 'https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLSfm5EOxtftVfabB3mBln9pja61xyiHgfpskcjhs_hlejEnLuA/viewform?embedded=true'

const useStyles = makeStyles(theme => ({
  linkStyle: {
    color: '#ff7f50', 
    cursor: 'pointer', 
    textDecoration: 'underline', 
    paddingTop: '3em', 
    fontSize: '1em' 
  },
  column: {
    height: 850, 
    backgroundColor: 
    theme.palette.common.eggplant, 
    color: 'white', 
    marginTop: '1em'
  }
}))

const FeedbackIFrame = () => {

  const classes = useStyles()
  const [showForm, setShowForm] = useState(false)

  const isSmallDisplay = useMediaQuery( { query: '(max-width: 480px)' } )

  const toggleForm = () => {
    setShowForm(!showForm)
  }

  if (!showForm) { 
    return (
      <div className={classes.linkStyle} onClick={toggleForm}>
        See something wrong? 
      </div>
    )
  }

  return (
    <Col justify="center">
      <Row justify="center">

        <div className={classes.linkStyle} onClick={toggleForm}>
          {showForm && 'Close feedback form'}
        </div>
  
      </Row>
      <Row justify="center" className={classes.column} 
        style={{width: isSmallDisplay ? '320px' : '425px' }}>

        <iframe src={iframeURL} 
          width='100%'
          height='100%' 
          frameBorder="0" 
          marginHeight="0" 
          marginWidth="0"
          overflowy='hidden'
          title="feedback form"
        >Loadingâ€¦
        </iframe>

      </Row>
    </Col>
  )
}

export default FeedbackIFrame

ui/src/components/Footer.js

import React from 'react'
import { Link, NavLink, useLocation } from 'react-router-dom'
import { Row, Col } from './Grid'
import FeedbackIFrame from './FeedbackIFrame'
import BottomNavigation from '@material-ui/core/BottomNavigation'
import BottomNavigationAction from '@material-ui/core/BottomNavigationAction'
import { FontAwesomeIcon } from '@fortawesome/react-fontawesome'
import { faBezierCurve, faBalanceScale } from '@fortawesome/free-solid-svg-icons' // methodology, SFADC
import MenuBookIcon from '@material-ui/icons/MenuBook' // glossary
import InsertCommentIcon from '@material-ui/icons/InsertComment' // feedback
import InfoIcon from '@material-ui/icons/Info' // disclaimer
import useStyles from '../theme/FooterStyles'
import Typography from '@material-ui/core/Typography'
import useMediaQuery from '@material-ui/core/useMediaQuery'
import { useTranslation } from 'react-i18next'
import i18n from '../i18n'
import { useTheme } from '@material-ui/core/styles'

/* conditionally renders either a mobile footer, or a footer for larger viewports */
export default function Footer() {
  const location = useLocation()
  const theme = useTheme()
  const classes = useStyles(theme)
  const { t, ready: translationReady } = useTranslation(
    'Footer' /* i18next-parser needs string here */,
    { useSuspense: false, i18n }
  )

  // MUI media query hook
  const isSmallDisplay = useMediaQuery('(max-width: 900px')

  if (!translationReady) return null

  if (isSmallDisplay) {
    return (
      <>
        {location.pathname !== '/' && (
          <Row justify='center'>
            <FeedbackIFrame />
          </Row>
        )}

        <BottomNavigation
          showLabels
          className={classes.rootMobile}
          style={{ marginTop: location.pathname === '/' ? 0 : 45 }}>

          <BottomNavigationAction
            label={t('Tenant Resources')}
            icon={<FontAwesomeIcon icon={faBalanceScale} size='lg' className='fa-icon' />}
            className='footerItem'
            component={Link}
            to={{ pathname: 'http://sfadc.org' }}
            target='_blank'
          />

          <BottomNavigationAction
            label={t('Glossary')}
            icon={<MenuBookIcon />}
            className='footerItem'
            component={NavLink}
            to='/glossary'
          />

          <BottomNavigationAction
            label={t('Methodology')}
            icon={<FontAwesomeIcon icon={faBezierCurve} size='lg' className='fa-icon' />}
            className='footerItem'
            component={NavLink}
            to='/methodology'
          />

          <BottomNavigationAction
            label={t('Feedback')}
            icon={<InsertCommentIcon />}
